Climate action

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia



Jump to navigation
Jump to search
Actions taken due to climate change
The present disambiguation page holds the title of a primary topic, and an article needs to be written about it. It is believed to qualify as a broad-concept article.

It may be written directly at this page or drafted elsewhere and then moved over here. Related titles should be described in Climate action, while unrelated titles should be moved to Climate action (disambiguation). Climate action (or climate change action) can refer to a range of activities and measures related to climate change, such as:

Climate change mitigation
Climate change adaptation
Individual action on climate change
Business action on climate change
Climate movement, Actions by non-governmental organizations
Topics referred to by the same term
